title: Deadlock - Berserk (EP) (2016)320ak
description:
Deadlock - Berserk (EP) (2016)320ak

Deadlock is a German melodic death metal band from Schwarzenfeld, Bavaria, Germany. In 2010 they supported Lacuna Coil on tour. The band consists of only founding member Sebastian Reichl (guitar) and with more recent recruits John Gahlert (vocals), Margie Gerlitz (vocals), Ferdinand Rewicki (guitar) and Werner Riedl (drums).

April 28, 2016, it was announced that Sabine Scherer was departing the band permanently to spend more time with her family, while also announcing that Gerlitz would become the new clean vocalist.

In May 2016, the band announced their new album Hybris along with the EP Berserk.

Tracklist

03  The Arsenic River.mp3
04  Martyr to Science.mp3
05  When The Time Runs Out (Running Wild Cover 2009).mp3
06  Earthlings (Bizarro World Japanese Edition 2011).mp3
